instruction.value: Administer "TEST" dose, wait 1 hour. If no adverse reactions, continue to administer remainder of dose.
Administer "TEST" dose over 15 minutes, wait 1 hour. If no adverse reactions, continue to administer remainder of dose.
Administer during each dialysis for 10 doses.

additionalnotes.value: Anemia of chronic renal failure. Administer until a minimum cumulative dose of 1,000 mg is reached.
Anemia of chronic renal failure: predialysis or peritoneal dialysis. Children weighing less than 10 kg.
Anemia of chronic renal failure: predialysis or peritoneal dialysis. Children weighing 10 to 20 kg.
Anemia of chronic renal failure: predialysis or peritoneal dialysis. Children weighing more than 20 kg.
Anemia of chronic renal failure: hemodialysis. Children weighing less than 10 kg.
Anemia of chronic renal failure: hemodialysis. Children weighing 10 to 20 kg.
Anemia of chronic renal failure: hemodialysis. Children weighing more than 20 kg.
Anemia of chronic renal failure: hemodialysis.

population.value: INFANT / CHILDREN, weighing less than 10 kg.
INFANT / CHILDREN, weighing more than 20 kg.
